Let's write a subroutine to find the lower bound (first element >= x) in a sorted array. Once we have the start index, we can iterate from there until the elements exceed r.

So, in Fortran:

subroutine lower_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    idx = high + 1
    do while (low <= high) mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) >= x) then
            idx = mid
            high = mid - 1
        else
            low = mid + 1
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

Similarly, upper_bound (first element > x):

subroutine upper_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    idx = high + 1
    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) > x) then
            idx = mid
            high = mid - 1
        else
            low = mid + 1
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

subroutine upper_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x

    low = 1

subroutine binary_search(arr, x, found, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    logical, intent(out) :: found
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    found = .false. low = 1
    high = size(arr) do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) == x) then
            found = .true. idx = mid
            return
        else if (arr(mid) < x) then
            low = mid + 1
        else
            high = mid - 1
        end if
    end do

    idx = low
    found = .false.

subroutine lower_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    idx = high + 1
    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) >= x) then
            idx = mid
            high = mid - 1
        else
            low = mid + 1
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

Similarly, upper_bound (first element > x):

subroutine upper_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    idx = high + 1
    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) > x) then
            idx = mid
            high = mid - 1
        else
            low = mid + 1
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

subroutine binary_search(arr, x, found, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    logical, intent(out) :: found
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    found = .false.
    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) == x) then
            found = .true.
            idx = mid
            return
        else if (arr(mid) < x) then
            low = mid + 1
        else
            high = mid -1
        end if
    end do
    idx = low ! insertion point
end subroutine

subroutine lower_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    idx = high + 1

    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) >= x) then
            idx = mid
            high = mid - 1
        else
            low = mid + 1
        end if
    end do
end subroutine lower_bound

subroutine upper_bound(arr, x, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    low = 1
    high = size(arr)
    idx = high + 1

    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) > x) then
            idx = mid
            high = mid - 1
        else
            low = mid + 1
        end if
    end do
end subroutine upper_bound

subroutine binary_search(arr, x, found, idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: arr(:), x
    logical, intent(out) :: found
    integer, intent(out) :: idx
    integer :: low, high, mid

    found = .false.
    low = 1
    high = size(arr)

    do while (low <= high)
        mid = (low + high) / 2
        if (arr(mid) == x) then
            found = .true.
            idx = mid
            return
        else if (arr(mid) < x) then
            low = mid + 1
        else
            high = mid - 1
        end if
    end do

    idx = low
    found = .false.
end subroutine binary_search
